column3: “Very good. Makes you feel very relaxed. Tastes great and has a sweet,  earthy taste to it.”

“I usually stick to a sativa for the obvious reasons, I like a indica on a very rare occasion-only before bed, if any at all. But I like this one. It gave me a giggly feeling and definitely eased my headache. I actually was able to work (fast paced, hard labor) and not feel sluggish. Definitely will keep this one around for a while. Oh! And it smells and tastes like chocolate 😁”
“A little toke goes a long way but, if you want to get all couch slap happy it will take you there.”

“Wow! This has a magnificent aroma! You get the sweetness of a coffee like smell with a nutty finish. I even get a bit of a cheesy note at the end.Now take it easy and it's an uplifting and focused strain. Go heavy and it's going to get you stuck on the couch or down for a nap. Buds are big, dense, and covered in trichomes. A+”
“From Cultivate in Leicester, MA. 27.6% THC 0.0% CBD.”
“One of my all time favorites, sometimes put me to sleep immediately or i was giggling for hours lmfao. Definitely a must try.”
“Love how the affects just creep in and just settle in the body, left me relaxed, mind at ease and over all the the way it smells and burns. Try this strain you won't regret it.”
“Pleasant buzz with this strain. Great for day or night. The couch lock is up to you, just don't try to overdue it. Did a great job easing pain in joints and muscles.”
“Whatever it is you like this has it in spades”
“Gets the job done well.  It was quite strong to begin with so I ground it and froze some kief off of it to take it down.  I can’t wait to see how the kief rips!”
“smells just like hersheys chocolate. tastes pretty good too!”

“Any time of day use, but ok to use at night as well. Doesn't cause drowsiness, but will relax you enough to go to sleep. Extremely helpful with severe anxiety symptoms and panic attacks. Highly recommended as a go to medicine for PTSD symptoms.”

“Well... I don't know what it is about this strain, but after 5ish hits of this from a cartridge it makes me super bed-locked and euphoric, which ends up turning me on. Definitely a stress and depression reliever. 😆 Also has a pleasant taste.”

“Alien OG is a very nice indica, relaxing and happy high. nice to smoke on a hot summers day in the park with the boys. very high THC level so if your smoking a lot of it don't underestimate its power.”
